 739: 
 740: '''
 741: @cython.boundscheck(False)
 742: @cython.initializedcheck(False)
 743: @cython.cdivision(True)
 744: def entropy_rate(int x, int lag, dict sparse):
 745:     """
 746:     H'(X) = lim(t -> inf)H(X_t | X_t-1, X_t-2 ... X_1)
 747:     In this case, we approximate it as:
 748:     
 749:     H'(X) = H(X_t | X_t-lag)
 750:     """
 751:     cdef double nbins = sparse["nbins"]
 752:     cdef int n
 753:     
 754:     cdef set X = sparse["channels"][x]
 755:     cdef double Nx = len(X)
 756:     cdef set Y = sparse["channels"][x]
 757:     cdef double Ny = len(Y)
 758:     
 759:     #Calculating H(X)
 760:     #See the entropy() function for the logic. 
 761:     cdef double p1_x = Nx / nbins
 762:     cdef double p0_x = 1 - p1_x
 763:     cdef double hx = -1*((p1_x*log2(p1_x)) + ((p0_x*log2(p0_x))))
 764:     
 765:     #Calculating H(X,Y)
 766:     #See the joint_entropy() function for the logic. 
 767:     cdef double hist_xy[2][2]
 768:     hist_xy[0][:] = [0., 0.]
 769:     hist_xy[1][:] = [0., 0.]
 770:     
 771:     red_xy = X.intersection(Y)
 772:     unq_x = X.difference(red_xy)
 773:     unq_y = Y.difference(red_xy)    
 774:     
 775:     hist_xy[1][1] = len(red_xy) / nbins
 776:     hist_xy[0][1] = len(unq_x) / nbins
 777:     hist_xy[1][0] = len(unq_y) / nbins 
 778:     hist_xy[0][0] = 1 - (hist_xy[1][1] + hist_xy[0][1] + hist_xy[1][0])
 779:         
 780:     cdef int i, j 
 781:     cdef double hxy = 0.0
 782:     for i in range(2):
 783:         for j in range(2):
 784:             if hist_xy[i][j] != 0:
 785:                 hxy -= hist_xy[i][j]*log2(hist_xy[i][j])
 786:     
 787:     return hxy - hx
 788: '''
